segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s chat about your pension. Can you tell me who the owner of the policy is? Just want to make sure we have everything right. Uh, can you hear me okay?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I can hear you! So, the owner is actually me. I set it up about ten years ago, but I can't remember the exact details right now.

segments.advisor_message: Got it. And do you recall what type of pension it is? Like, is it a Defined Contribution or a Defined Benefit plan?
segments.client_message: Um, I think it's a Defined Contribution plan. The provider is, uh, I believe it's called Future Investments. I should check my papers for the policy number and value, though.
